    G

    Game - Class in Unnamed Package
    Class used to store the game main logic and important methods
    Game() - Constructor for class Game
    Constructor, contains the initialization of locks, gear locks, enemies, player,etc.
    GameState - Class in Unnamed Package
    Class used to store and save the game's data, which we later use when loading the game(Serialization)
    GameState() - Constructor for class GameState
    Constructor
    gearLock - Variable in class Room
    GearLock instance
    gearLock - Variable in class World
    Gear lock instance
    GearLock - Class in Unnamed Package
    Class used to implement the Lock located in the Celery(Player has to insert all 4 GearPieces to proceed)
    GearLock(Room, Room) - Constructor for class GearLock
    Constructor
    GearPiece - Class in Unnamed Package
